definition: ورش waraša يرش yarišu (warš) to interfere with s.o.’s (jo) p1&ns, thrust o.s. on s.o. (على) II to disturb the peace, make trouble ورش wariš lively, brisk; restless, restive ورشة warša pl. -āt, ورش wiraš workshop │ ورشة الإصلاح w. al-iṣlāḥ repair shop, service station; ورشة الغسيل laundry
